text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali v Allakha i Yego poslannika! Kogda vy zhelayete vesti taynuyu besedu s poslannikom, to pered besedoy razdayte milostynyu. Eto luchshe dlya vas i chishche dlya vashikh serdets. A yesli vy ne naydote, chto razdat' v kachestve milostyni, to Allakh - Proshchayushchiy i miloserdiye Yego bezgranichno
